strapiEvent.name: Arkansas Local
strapiEvent.description:
Show up to The Barn at the Springs on Sept. 17 for a good time and a good cause! 

  • Get together: Shared Beginnings is putting on a party on Sept. 17 from 6-10p to raise money for mothers and expectant mothers considering adoption. There will be carnival style games, inflatables and an array of NWAâ€™s finest food vendors. 
  • Support: Your ticket includes a Shared Beginnings signature cocktail, and you can purchase an add-on for 3 drinks if you so please. The proceeds of the evening will go toward therapy and support for those who need it. 

For more information and tickets, click HERE.
